engine

Class Recommender

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.Recommender

  • public class Recommender
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides various scoring methods, along with a collaborative filtering recommendation algorithm.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Recommender

        public Recommender(Graph og)
        Creates a Recommender object from a Graph. INVARIANT: The graph must be directed and bipartite.
        Parameters:
        og - the Graph from which to construct the Recommender

    • Method Detail

      • collabFilter

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> collabFilter(int userID,
                                             java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Double,java.util.List<Node>> scores,
                                             int numUsers,
                                             int numRecommends)
        This method implements the collaborative filtering algorithm for finding recommendations. It accepts a TreeMap of scores that can be generated using either the Pearson or Jaccard scores.
        Parameters:
        userID - the user for which to provide recommendations
        scores - the scores to use for collaborative filtering
        numUsers - the number of similar users to find
        numRecommends - the number of recommendations (if any) to return
        Returns:
        the list of recommended nodes

      • getPearsonScores

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Double,java.util.List<Node>> getPearsonScores(int userID)
        Provides a method for getting all of the Pearson Correlation Coefficient scores for a given Node.
        Parameters:
        userID - the Node whose scores you wish to find
        Returns:
        a TreeMap of scores to a list of Nodes with that score

      • getJaccardScores

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Double,java.util.List<Node>> getJaccardScores(int userID)
        Provides a method for getting all of the Jaccard Correlation Coefficient scores for a given Node.
        Parameters:
        userID - the Node whose scores you wish to find
        Returns:
        a TreeMap of scores to a list of Nodes with that score

      • getTopMatches

        private java.util.Set<Node> getTopMatches(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Double,java.util.List<Node>> map,
                                int limit)
        Provides a method for returning a given number of top matches from a given map of scores.
        Parameters:
        map - the map of scores
        limit - the maximum number of top scores to return
        Returns:
        the list of nodes corresponding to the top limit scores

      • getPearsonCoeff

        private double getPearsonCoeff(Node n1,
                     Node n2)
        Method for calculating the Pearson Correlation Coefficient score for two given Nodes.
        Parameters:
        n1 - the first Node
        n2 - the second Node
        Returns:
        the score for the two nodes

      • getJaccardCoeff

        private double getJaccardCoeff(Node n1,
                     Node n2)
        Calculate Jaccard coefficient for n1 and n2. If A = neighbors(n1) and B = neighbors(n2) coeff = (A ∩ B) / (A ∪ B)
        Parameters:
        n1 - the first node
        n2 - the second node
        Returns:
        the Jaccard similarity coefficient between n1 and n2

      • getMovieLensNames

        public java.lang.String getMovieLensNames(int user,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> items)
                                   throws java.util.zip.DataFormatException
        Converts the given list of items to the movieLens names.
        Parameters:
        user - the user of the items
        items - the items to convert
        Returns:
        the String to output
        Throws:
        java.util.zip.DataFormatException
